CSSPseudoElement.summary: NOTE Experimental The CSSPseudoElement interface represents a pseudo-element that may be the target of an event or animated using the . Instances of this interface may be obtained by calling .

CSSPseudoElementElement.summary:
NOTE Experimental The element read-only property of the
interface returns a reference to the originating element
of the pseudo-element, in other words its parent element.
CSSPseudoElementElement.value: An representing the pseudo-element's originating element.

CSSPseudoElementType.summary:
NOTE Experimental The type read-only property of the
interface returns the type of the pseudo-element as a
string, represented in the form of a CSS selector.
CSSPseudoElementType.value: A string containing one of the following values:
